import re
from urllib.parse import urlparse

def extract_urls(input_string):
    potential_urls = re.findall('', input_string)
    valid_urls = [url for url in potential_urls if urlparse(url).scheme and urlparse(url).netloc and urlparse(url).path]
    return valid_urls

mutants.code:
import re
from urllib.parse import urlparse

def extract_urls(input_string):
    potential_urls = re.findall('https://[^\\s]*', input_string)
    valid_urls = [url for url in potential_urls if urlparse(url).scheme or urlparse(url).netloc or urlparse(url).path]
    return valid_urls
